item.title: The future of Runescape - Everyone must watch
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“xI c E, post:25, topic:480119”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=598354.msg4209933#msg4209933 date=1359398501]

Change.org

Petition unterschreiben

Jagex Games Studios: Add Pre-EoC Game Servers Back into Runescape

Official petition lol

Jagex can go back on their word. Example: Free trade. Everyone thought that Jagex would never go back to the free trade system and they eventually went back.
[/quote]

This is much more than a trading system though, you’re talking about wasting lots of hours put into the EoC and the updates that came after it. People have to understand from a company’s perspective as to why the EoC happened, you can’t really change what already has happened now.[/quote]Much more than a trading system? The free trade market in RuneScape was the economy. As soon as the economy became a command economy instead of the original market economy the game quickly went south. The point was at first Jagex stated several times that they will “never go back on free trade”, and ~3 years later they did. Jagex will get desperate, may not to go open old 2006 servers, but take a different approach such revising the EoC or the like.

Read full topic
item.source: The future of Runescape - Everyone must watch

item.title: The future of Runescape - Everyone must watch

Change.org

Petition unterschreiben

Jagex Games Studios: Add Pre-EoC Game Servers Back into Runescape

Official petition lol

Jagex can go back on their word. Example: Free trade. Everyone thought that Jagex would never go back to the free trade system and they eventually went back.
[/quote]

This is much more than a trading system though, you’re talking about wasting lots of hours put into the EoC and the updates that came after it. People have to understand from a company’s perspective as to why the EoC happened, you can’t really change what already has happened now.[/quote]
That’s the price you have to pay for not listening to the community.

Read full topic

item.source: The future of Runescape - Everyone must watch

item.title: The future of Runescape - Everyone must watch
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:12, topic:480119”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=598354.msg4209037#msg4209037 date=1359302949]
Eh, never say never. I think they’ll realize how much monetary value is in opening an old server.
[/quote]
Only at first.

We’re only talking ~40k people. They’d have to open an entire department to manage and update it. And it would split the modern playerbase. You’d end up with one game that wouldn’t attract any new players, and a modern game with barely any playerbase.[/quote]40,000 x $7.99 = $319,600 every month. Plus, you wouldn’t have to hire a new management team or development team, you could just carry over the employees from the other development teams. I’d imagine Jagex had to let go of some developers and maybe they can hire them back.

Read full topic
item.source: The future of Runescape - Everyone must watch

Only at first.
